sesu anthar jathika prajawa menma shri lankawa da libiyawe siwil janathawage aarakshawa pilibanda gataluwa kerehi wimasillen pasuwana bawa rajaya awadharanaya karayi.siwil janathawage aarakshawa thahawuru kirime di pawathna wenaskam sakachcha margayen wisanda ganime mangakata yomu wiya yuthu athara, libiyawa samanga digu kalak sabandatha pawathwana shri lankawa ewani samakami wathawaranayakata ikmaninma yomu wethayi apeksha karana bawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya sandahan karayi.prachandakarithwaya hethuwen janathawage thaththwaya pirihimata ida diya yuthu nathayi pawasana widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya siwil janathawage aarakshawa sahathika karanu pinisa prachandathwayen walaki sitina lesa siyalu parshwayangen illimak karayi.libiyawe pawathina gatumkari thaththwaya hethuwen erata siti shri lankikayan gen wadi pirisak me wana witath meratata genwa gena thibena athara kamaththen erata randi sitina pirisage da aarakshawa pilibanda niranthara awadhanayen sitina bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye prakashakayek pawasiya.libiyawe, tripoli nuwara pihiti shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya da thawakalikawa wasa damimata shri lanka rajaya piyawara gena thibena athara, erata thaththwaya yahapath wu sanin yali ema thanapathi karyalaye katayuthu aarambha kirimata niyamithayi..

wishesha awashyatha athi daruwanwa api amathaka karanne naha.owun apema samajaye kotasak.aththatama me daruwan wenuwen mewani wadasatahanak karanan kalgiya wadiyi kiyalayi mama hithanne.me awasthawe mulika piyawarak lesa api wishesha awashyatha athi daruwange dal pandu kandayamak hadanna balaporoththu wenawa.daruwo wishesha waidya parikshanayakata yomu karala puhunuwa sandaha thora gannawa.idiriyedi krikat,papandu wage kridawanda wishesha awashyatha athi daruwan wenuwen aarambha kirima mage aramuna.disthrik ha palath krida tharagawalata me daruwange tharaga isaw athulath kirima kerehith dan awadhanaya yomuwa thibenne."
